website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for first-time pet owners who need something simple to assemble. Will accommodate small to medium sized animals up to 30 pounds. Easy on the budget.
pros: The VIVO Three Wheel Pet Stroller has wide mesh windows that provide excellent ventilation and visibility.30 pound upper limit for larger pets
Numerous zipper pockets for extra storage (drinks, snacks, blankets, etc.)
cons: Entry-level and not sturdy enough for rough terrain

customer_reviews.title: My Little Dog is a Whopping 25 Pounds!
customer_reviews.text: Even though my dog is small, she is big boned and full of muscle. I was so nervous that my 25 pound dog would weigh too much for this carriage, but it's pure perfection. There is a 30 pound maximum so all is good. It's the cutest carriage ever and I literally got it in THREE days! Awesome. The price is great to compared to others. My dog was good in it, but a little nervous... it might take a little time for her to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Stroller for French Bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. We have a darling little french bulldog that is black/brindle and gets hot very easily. In the summertime we have to limit her walks due to how easily she can overheat. She loves riding in her stroller and then we will take her out and walk awhile. After ten or fifteen minutes, she will just stop and wait to be put back in the stroller. The wheels are very strudy and go up over curbs and through the grass with ease. Our Frenchie weighs around 18 pounds so this stroller is plenty big and holds up well for her size. She often looks through the mesh opening or can easily look around over the top in front.
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great 😊
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME 😁.... Easy handling on different terrain, (concrete,rug, asphalt, grass). I like that there are 2 collar clips for security as well as different access points with the multiple zippers (tabs are foldable when unzipped and peeled back). Very clean looking, no stains or rips found as with other customers. My pup ( 5lb Yorkie) loves it and can easily hop in and out of it on her own. 2 cupholders (standard sizes). The only issue I have is the GIANT contrasting logo right at the top of the canopy. It would be nice if it was smaller and/or not so obvious. (Maybe a more muted color combination.)
customer_reviews.author: BJBO

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is cute as can be! I got it for my Shihtzu puppy. She sleeps in it at night because it comforts her. The crate was to airy and she is small, so she likes everything around her, making her feel safe! It is of a good size that she will grow into it. She loves going outside in it for a stroll and get sunshine. Fit her needs for winter time, come spring she can sleep in her crate . Sleeping in the stroller at night comforts her and she sleeps longer and do do I.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: So cute and so functional!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller for my new cat who loves the outdoors. It arrived very fast. I cannot put anything together and it was easy for me to assemble. The pink color is bright and beautiful! We were outside in it within the hour! My cat weighs about 5.5 lbs (she is small) so it is perfect for her. I could also fit her brother cat in it and he weighs 10 lbs. The quality is good, the price was excellent, and we will have a great time in it this summer! If you're looking for a great pet stroller, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Definite buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and after getting used to it....my pup didn't mind it. There are two leashes on the inside for two pets....however I found that by putting both on my pups harness....she wasn't able to jump over the side when we left the mesh open. It worked out great. It also doubled for us as a "crate" for her to sleep in at the hotel...as we're still working on the potty training. The strap did rip on the bottom, however, I blame ourselves for that. We put too much weight in it. However, I was able to McGyver it by tying it back together with zip ties! Now it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Champlin

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get the front put on don’t fit with the holes so it’s not put together yet still trying to figure out how to make it work putting the front piece on. Got it figured out works good like it and my dogs not 2 sure yet lol
customer_reviews.author: Wildflowers

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. Quite possibly the best amazon purchase i have ever made! My dog absolutely loves it. We don't go anywhere without it. We take her everywhere and everyone always comments how cute she is. We even took this into a major league baseball stadium for bark in the park day! The stroller is well made and we have taken it over some pretty rough terrain with no issues. Its easy to push and collapse to load up in the car. I've been using it for almost 8 months and it has held up well including the zippers which i was worried about. No complaints and i highly recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in excellent condition - double boxed
customer_reviews.text: Received our VIVO Three Wheel Pet Stroller soon after order placed. Arrived in excellent condition - double boxed. Stroller is perfect for our 4-lb Yorkie. She loves to ride in it. Sometimes she stands up with two front feet on basket rim, looking out to see what's going on. It also works great to keep her in while we are out working the lawn. She can stand up and watch us or when she chooses, she lays down and looks out the screens or takes a nap. We put a folded blanket in bottom for her comfort. Was happy to see from supplier email that parts are available. May need replacement tires in time.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: My special baby girl
customer_reviews.text: Great for our 3 leg mini pomeranian! She lost her leg recently and I'm in a wheelchair myself! So the nurses aides push her around with no trouble! Not ment for over 10 lbs. in my opinion!! She jumps and it shakes very easy and she's 7.1 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: susan mills

customer_reviews.title: I bought this stroller and it came in pretty fast. I only gave 4 stars simply because ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller and it came in pretty fast . I only gave 4 stars simply because it took me about 30 minutes to put it together . You only have to put the wheels on and screw in a few extra pieces but the directions were a bit short so I was left kinda winging it. All in all I like it now that it's put together . No directions on how exactly to fold it up so I was getting a little frustrated with it towards the end but I finally figured it out and now that it's all said and done it's a good strolled. I recommend getting it.
customer_reviews.author: nick nick

customer_reviews.title: For the quality of the stroller, it isn't worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is too small and so light weight the wind blows it badly. My little dog does not like the stroller. The stroller is no comparison to her old stroller. This is the fourth stroller that I have ordered, and in this price range, the strollers would be okay for cats not dogs. Now to get a stroller with adequate weight and size, the price is much too expensive. I would not recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Evans

customer_reviews.title: Effective yet hazardous
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys, Recently I purchased the VIVO per stroller. Honestly I love it, I can take her (my 9yo 17lb Jack Russell terrier) every where with me. Unfortunately, when we were shopping in a boutique one day she was in her stroller and the balance of the stroller went backwards and fell on me when I was using the bottom storage compartment to carry our purchases. Also, when the stroller arrived it looked as though it had been used. I still had to put it together but there was rust on the metal. Be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Reid

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made and it didn't come with any hardware to put the wheels on. Amazon wont send a new one because it's a 3rd person. Even tho I'm prime no one did anything to fix a 68. Dollar purchase that can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: So Zoey Pet Boutique

customer_reviews.title: Defective otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a black one and loved it so much. It arrived quickly and no problems. So i ordered another one but pink with polka dots. It did get here quickly and its beautiful. Only problem is when i put it together i could not fold it and on the handle to fold it something was messed up. I now have problems with it. Only thing is my fiance through out the packaging and paperwork for the stroller due to hurricaine Irma we had to throw out all trash and the boxes were so big we needed room to bring stuff in from outside. So i have a messed up stroller. Other than that i would give 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy access, smooth ride stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love the polka dotted pattern, so..cute! The wheels are smooth, lots of zippered compartments for easy access and security. Back of stroller zips down, so you can have easy access for dog to jump in. I got it for fun for my daughter to push around her kitties, guinea pig, and chickens. The neighbors have a great laugh and it gives her exercise:) It even comes with cup holders! I highly recommend this one over the different ones I have come across.It opens and closes easily with one hand and a click on the handle. There is a clip on the side to hold stroller together when in storage. Easy storage, doesn't take up much space
customer_reviews.author: jenjen

customer_reviews.title: Unstable stroller
customer_reviews.text: The only fault I've found with this stroller is that it will tip over very easily. My Malteese is 11 pounds. If I don't hold on to the handle at all times it will tip over backwards. Unfortunately, I found that out the hard way. I'd noticed that the front tires would come off the ground easily when I was pushing it but I thought it was something I was doing wrong. The next time I use it I'm going to put something heavy in the front to see if I can help offset this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Annette B.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this stroller - and so do my neighbors!
customer_reviews.text: My Cavalier has health issues and can no longer walk distances but still loves to be outside. With this adorable stroller, I am able to walk with her as long as she can, then sit her in the stroller and finish our walk. Her head goes back and forth as she watches what is happening along the way. If it starts to sprinkle or the sun gets too hot, I love that I can just pull the hood over. This stroller has everything I need in one package to keep my fur baby safe and calm.
customer_reviews.author: Connie G

customer_reviews.title: It's convenient.
customer_reviews.text: My dog🐶 loves it. The stroller is so convenient for the summertime my dog even lets me know what days she wants to go in it when she wants to go bye-bye’s she just Hopsin it and lets me know she wants the carriage today... so funny” happy dog! My scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer. Paris NY Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is perfect. I have two Yorkies and each one weighs 9 pounds. They both fit in there and still have room to move around. It can be used open or enclosed. It is very well ventilated and it was very easy to put together . my girls love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ce1227

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love this stroller. I have a 5 pound 5 month old morkie who is friendly to everybody she sees and likes to jump to get to them. The first time she fell I bought this. Didn't want my baby hurt. Me and my 11 year old put it together watching an assembly video on YouTube because the instructions it came with are not very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: mzeve

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with everything about this stroller. It is very easy to maneuver with the three wheels. I had a four wheel stroller before I purchased this one and find this one much easier to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: ruth l

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for a better quality stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I am not thrilled with the stroller I purchased. It came missing pieces, then after I put it together the basket would not stay attached. Since the basket kept coming undone, it dragged the ground while trying to use the stroller. The basket is now destroyed after only one use. I don’t like that the clips to secure your pet feel very flimsy. The stroller itself did an okay job but this overall experience was not positive.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Horton

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: almost didnt buy it based on reviews ive read on tipping an sue enough it does, i have 2 little dogs that come to close 5 pounds combined an if they both come to the back it tips. so outside of that i love it. i just hold on an keep walking
customer_reviews.author: jamiehere

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, shabbily made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, all of the zippers broke (split apart) on my first use. The fabric hinges at the bottom tore away when I put a baseball hat in the fabric basket. The wheels have zero tread after walking on a paved road. Great concept, shabbily made. I'll repair the zippers myself and my boyfriend will change out the wheels. Contacted VIVO and they want pictures which I'll send. Just wanted them to know that the workmanship is shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Kh

customer_reviews.title: Adorable,Safe way to have my furry baby with me.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable Doggie Stroller. Its the perfect size and it is both sturdy and stable. I have already used it a numder of times and its a perfect way to have my furry baby with me safe and sound instead of carrying her in my arms and she just LOVES it!! There are plenty of mesh ports for me to keep an eye on her and for my baby to see whats going on outside. I made a Great choice!!!
customer_reviews.author: JeanS

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for carrying a Dog
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for carrying a Dog, Cat or any pet, as well as other belongings which are more convenient to push. Nice color, not to bright, and attractive styling, very soft for the comfort of your furry friends! very light and foldable, has an extra storage net beneath the main stroller part. very good price for the stroller as opposed to the alternatives I had shopped for. And very high quality. Easy assembly, only took a couple of minutes before it was fully ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer J.

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the one wheel in front makes it unstable flipped over my little ones first ride if I had it to do over again I buy the one with the two wheels in the front
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J. Diperna

customer_reviews.title: Its not very sturdy, very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Its not very sturdy, very flimsy. Its cheap. The foot rest that it comes with came with screws that aren't long enough to attach it. My dog is 8 pounds I would be afraid to put a dog in it that weighs more than her. I don't like it but its not worth paying to ship it back and then having shipping deducted from my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie & Slober

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller! I can take Sophie(6lb shih tzu) anywhere (including my son's basketball games) and nobody knows my furbaby is inside 😁😉
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLyyfe

customer_reviews.title: Dog stroller
customer_reviews.text: The stroller came used used, damaged and missing parts. They were going to send me a new unused one, but I never heard back from them. The stroller itself is nice, just what my dog needed. Won’t by from the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Memo

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Greatest stroller for my 2 pups!! It’s ez to push them around when they’re too lazy to walk!!
customer_reviews.author: Pink Lady

customer_reviews.title: What doesn't work for one works for another!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller for my sister. She has a small Maltese and it's hard for her to carry Taffi, so I got her this item. Turns out Taffi doesn't like it and won't get in it. So my sister gave it to a co-worker and her dog loves it, and when she gets in it doesn't want to get out. So all's well that ends well!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and works!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for.. but honestly this is comparable to the higher priced strollers. Easy to use and store. The instructions suck but if you have a brain you can figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Loisel

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this higher, but it's true that you get what you pay for. It is not easy to fold up, and although the assembly was fairly easy, i've noticed that after using it just twice, the wheels are quite worn, and my dog can jump out of it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for medium size dogs
customer_reviews.text: I'm am very happy with my purchase. It's comfortable for my dog and has 3 entry in the stroller with cup holders and a bottom carry for storage. Perfect size stroller to get up and get your day started.
customer_reviews.author: Itslexdoe_

customer_reviews.title: Dog stroller and exercising
customer_reviews.text: very nice, easy to handle. I think the wheels in the front help to move the stroller much better that wheels on each side. I purchased it so I could get my exercising in. My Boston Terrier loves it. She sits in it, tied up with the straps provided, looks around, and I get to pick up my speed.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB

customer_reviews.title: Great dog stroller
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small dogs, well build. A bit hard to close but nothing too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stroller! We just adopted a sweet senior maltese and she can not keep up with our other two dogs. She loves going for walks, but she gets tired so quickly. This stroller is so cute and perfect for what we needed. Now she can come for our long walks, and walk only when she wants!
customer_reviews.author: Felice Racenstein

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful stroller! I love the color
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful stroller! I love the color ! It is a 3 wheeler instead of 4 but it is great! Proud 2 put my puppy, Xena inside and walk the boardwalk!! U all will love it! Easy 2 put 2gether as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a blind cat, and she ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a blind cat, and she loves it. I'm able to lower it without completely collapsing it and use it to transport her to and from the park. It's a smooth ride. I set it up in the house and she occasionally crawls into it to nap.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: love everything about it and my dog loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Virtuous Woman

customer_reviews.title: ... this stroller for my aging dog so she can enjoy her walks more
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stroller for my aging dog so she can enjoy her walks more. It arrived on-time and was easy to put together. Have used it many times since. Very sturdy and the color is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Terri B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect doggie stroller, so cute, rolls easily, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stroller. So does my daschund! It is so cute. The pink is a much better color than the photo. It's more hot pink and white polka dots with black trim. Easy to put together. Rolls so easily. Definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: pinksugarcanel

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I ever made was to purchase stroller
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing a stroller for my 14 y/o morkie. I'm I glad I did. She loves it and so do I. Now she can really go everywhere with me.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love this, the only thing g is it doesn’t do well on dirt roads, very light & easy to transport. My puppy loves taking walks now.
customer_reviews.author: pauline

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It's perfect for our little chi/pin that suffers from idiopathic epilepsy. She travels with us everywhere. The height is perfect. I don't have to bend down while pushing which was an issue with the old stroller we had. It's cute and I like the cup holders and the basket on the bottom. It's perfect for flea market days!
customer_reviews.author: rere

customer_reviews.title: Great Ride for Miss Molly
customer_reviews.text: Our Molly, 12 year old Schnauzer, absolutely loves her stroller. She not only likes going out for rides but she lies in it while we are watching TV or working in the house. Easily assembled. We have had it since Feb 2016. Miss Molly lies in it or goes for a stroll everyday. The Stroller is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Billie J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it... Its the second one I have bought. Green for the boys and pink formula girls.
customer_reviews.author: J.West

customer_reviews.title: Riding in Style!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly perfect for my 2 yorkies. We will be using this many weekends protesting and going to rallies, and with all the storage, I won't need my backpack! The girls and I will be fighting for our rights in style!
customer_reviews.author: m theodoro

customer_reviews.title: Pebbles absolutely loves her new stroller we all like pushing her in it it was easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Pebbles absolutely loves her new stroller we all like pushing her in it it was easy to put together and love the pattern to thank you we love it
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice roomy stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love the stroller and so does Abby Sue. The only issue is putting the wheels on. After several months of usage the wheels become uneven wear which makes a bumpy ride. The wheels need replace now with better made ones. The bottom basket is great for items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many nice comments from the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little pet carriage. My dog loves it and enjoys her rides in it. So many nice comments from the neighbors, too. It is made very well for the price. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as expected. Zippers seem cheaply made and will tear if any pressure is applied. Not as easy to use as similar baby strollers. Wouldn't buy this one again, and will have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me and my pups !
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet stroller! I can walk longer and faster. My pups get to walk all they want and they can take breaks when needed.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awe I love it😍 Its very light weight so the wind is a problem... But its so adorable and my two Chihuahuas love this!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pet Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! It was easy to put together. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Storm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my older dachshund.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a life saver for my 10 year old dachshund. She's a little chunky weighing 16 lbs and this holds her perfectly. She gets very tired during our walks and needs a rest. When she gets tired we put her in the stroller to rest until she's ready to go again as we continue walking. It was very easy to assemble and set up quickly. I love the pink polka dots and the cup holders. You can't beat this for the price!
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOG STROLLER EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other strollers but this one is so easy to use and meneauver. My dog loves it and so do I. She will sit in it and watch me mow or clean up outside. She loves it that much! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much better in person
customer_reviews.text: Looks so much better in person. Absolutely love it, Lots of room for my toy poodle to move around in.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Cute stroller for my precious kitty!
customer_reviews.text: The step about putting on the drink tray is missing, but I figured it out. Cute, easy to maneuver and set up, and a snap to open and close. Can't wait for it to stop raining to try it out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, it’s super cute and sturdy, my pup loves that we can take her anywhere !
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Good product as described
customer_reviews.text: Good product as described. Bought this as a gift for a friend and it was easy to install. Her dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Abner J. Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent material
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material I’ve had it for years already And looks new 👌🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for our cat
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Our cat sits high and is very comfortable and feels safe while being pushed on walks.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what happened.....
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even take it out of the plastic once we saw this in the pics....
customer_reviews.author: Barry Brown

customer_reviews.title: VIVO three wheel pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: Well built unit. Very easy to put together, maybe 15 minutes tops. Easy to manuaver, could not be happier with this dog stroller. Color is a bright pink with white polka dots
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried to fold it yet, so I can’t rate that. But I LOVE this stroller & so does my fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Adrina Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, easy use, safe, and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of use and that this stroller has two collar leads. So it’s perfect to put my two little girls in. So easy to use, honestly easier to use than my grandson’s stroller! And takes less space to store!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller! It was better than what I expected. So easy to assemble my 12 yr. old daughter did it. Bough it for my daughter's dog Princess for her 7th doggie birthday, & she loves it so much she doesn't want to get out. I definitely recommend you buy it. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra gary

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves her stroller so much. We get lots of nods when were shopping. Great company
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S. Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as solid as my last on, feels very light.
customer_reviews.author: animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Stroller wasted my Money
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, fell apart second use with 5 pound Pomeranian :(
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D. A. LAPER

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy and not last. I had the stroller since September 16th,20. And we barely use it. The front wheel is broken now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: this is so darn cute!! my new puppy loves it and so do I...very convenient when I am out doing errands with her...I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maidyne Vu

customer_reviews.title: So far it's holding up good. I haven't used much but in 7 years ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's holding up good. I haven't used much but in 7 years this is my 4th stroller for my Bichon. We use them till they about fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: NurseGirl

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SMOOTH STROLLER!!
customer_reviews.text: My lil doxie Trixie loves her doggy stroller. My daughter walks her lil doxie jazzy as for trix is getting older so she doesn't care to walk far. However today we will see if jaz would like to stroll as well. I put stroller together in 5 min. And it strolls very smooth for our pups who are treated as children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stroller is so beautiful. However it comes with a damage part and ...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is so beautiful. However it comes with a damage part and a missing screw so the brake is not functional. I requested a refund for, but it was not approved since I need to return item. This product arrived in a non sealed box, wrapped with a plastic ribbon, so looks like product was previously returned.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Mora

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller overall
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Decent quality. The only bad so far is the quick release handle doesn't work. It didn't work out of the box. Not that big of a deal for me. My previous stroller didn't have the quick release lever. Have to unlatch on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: JGallo

customer_reviews.title: Riding in style!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased. The print is adorable and it was very easy to assemble, however I found the foot rest pointless so I just left it off. The swivel wheel makes it easy to maneuver. The wheels are plastic so they will eventually where down side but for the price I paid I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Great color!!
customer_reviews.text: Missing a couple of screws.. But besides that it's a great stroller. I was able to replace the screws.
customer_reviews.author: hlynne

customer_reviews.title: Best dog stroller on amazon worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller I am recommending this to all my friends it's so perfect for everything. I wish I had gotten one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... difficult to close and open but otherwise I really like this.
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to close and open but otherwise I really like this.

customer_reviews.title: only thing was the back wheels don't stay.
customer_reviews.text: only thing was the back wheels don't stay. The gift I bought it for loves it and so does the little dog
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie M.

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: This item tips over very easily with only 3 wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it just what I was looking for to take my doggies with me when I go shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller and it was easy to put together! My dog loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, colorful, perfect for little dogs.
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for my little Frenchie, storage area and cup holders are great. easy assembly. only set back if your pet bounces around in the carriage it may tip over, because she is a puppy perhaps when she settles down she won't be bouncing around as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and it's so cute! I tested it out and wheeled them around the house, my dog was so upset when I took her out she hopped in the undercarriage!
customer_reviews.author: John A Galarza-Calderon

customer_reviews.title: ... used it for the first time and it is great.
customer_reviews.text: Actually just used it for the first time and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: denise imperato

customer_reviews.title: This is made so well and I can't believe how ...
customer_reviews.text: This is made so well and I can't believe how low the price was.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It is a big unsteady though. Always have to keep a hand on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Omg this wasn’t easy to put together there were missing parts luckily I had some stuff to recover some of those parts .
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: That all pcs are in box
customer_reviews.text: One of the back wheels is missing. Can it be replaced? If not I will need to return item with full refund. I hope you can replace the. Wheel. I really love the stroller. Thank you. Summer2954@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Droege

customer_reviews.title: puppy security
customer_reviews.text: The zipper pops open easily allowing dogs to jump out.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle L. Ham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so do my pups. It is even better than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! We always get compliments. Great price and value
customer_reviews.author: T. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dog stroller
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together. It's lightweight and super cute! There's a nice big enclosed space where your dog can look out, you can also have it I enclosed. The large basket and two drink holders are a nice bonus. We bought this for our 19 lb dog and he has lots of room to be comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made very well at such a good price! Fast delivery 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: What a fabulous product. Made very well at such a good price! Fast delivery 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: great stroller, my friend loved it so much she got one for her dog too!

product_meta.title: VIVO Three Wheel Pet Stroller, for Cat, Dog and More, Fordable Carrier Strolling Cart, Multiple Colors
feature_bullets: PET COMPARTMENT - Large protective space with zipper access points for ease of use
CAPACITY - This pet stroller is able to hold any pets weighing up to 30 lbs
MESH WINDOWS - Allow pet to see while in the pet compartment as well as providing ventilation to ensure pet’s safety and health during use
STORING STROLLER - Collapsible stroller folds up easily to prevent hassle and to save space
STORAGE - Dual cup holders, center tray, and spacious basket underneath all provide convenient placement for extra items while you take your pet for a walk in the park or shopping at the store

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
